subject: Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: A bad shoulder will keep the Olympic silver medalist Samantha Peszek out of the world championships. Peszek announced that she was withdrawing her name from consideration for next month’s championships and will have surgery to repair a torn labrum. She had been among 10 gymnasts invited to the final selection camp, which begins Sept. 30 at the Karolyi ranch outside Houston.
